short_desc: If MOCALAN is 2 then LANGC2C2T should = 2
full_desc: If Q1b. MOCALAN (language of MOCA) is 2 then Q0c. LANGC2C2T (form language) should = 2

short_desc: If NPSYLAN is 2 then LANGC2C2T should = 2
full_desc: If Q2a. NPSYLAN (other tests language) is 2 then Q0c. LANGC2C2T (form language) should = 2

short_desc: If MOCAHEAR is 1 then RESPHEAR should = 1
full_desc: If Q1c. MOCAHEAR (MOCA hearing issue) is 1 then Q16b1. RESPHEAR (validity - hearing issue) should = 1

short_desc: If COGSTAT is 1 or 2 then CDRGLOB should be <2
full_desc: If Q15a. COGSTAT (overall appraisal) is 1 or 2 then B4 Q8. CDRGLOB (CDR global score) should be <2

short_desc: If RMMODEC2C2T=1, then all of (MOCALOC, MOCAVIS, MOCATOTS, MOCATRAI, MOCACUBE, MOCACLOC, MOCACLON, MOCACLOH, MOCANAMI, MOCAREGI, NPSYCLOC, UDSBENTC, TRAILA, TRAILARR, TRAILALI, TRAILB, TRAILBRR, TRAILBLI, UDSBENTD, UDSBENRS, REYMETHOD, CERAD1READ, CERAD2READ, CERAD3READ, MINTTOTS, MINTTOTW, MINTSCNG, MINTSCNC, MINTPCNG, MINTPCNC) must be blank
full_desc: If RMMODEC2C2T=1 (telephone), then all of (MOCALOC, MOCAVIS, MOCATOTS, MOCATRAI, MOCACUBE, MOCACLOC, MOCACLON, MOCACLOH, MOCANAMI, MOCAREGI, NPSYCLOC, UDSBENTC, TRAILA, TRAILARR, TRAILALI, TRAILB, TRAILBRR, TRAILBLI, UDSBENTD, UDSBENRS, REYMETHOD, CERAD1READ, CERAD2READ, CERAD3READ, MINTTOTS, MINTTOTW, MINTSCNG, MINTSCNC, MINTPCNG, MINTPCNC) must be blank
test_logic: RMMODEC2C2T=1 and any of (MOCALOC, MOCAVIS, MOCATOTS, MOCATRAI, MOCACUBE, MOCACLOC, MOCACLON, MOCACLOH, MOCANAMI, MOCAREGI, NPSYCLOC, UDSBENTC, TRAILA, TRAILARR, TRAILALI, TRAILB, TRAILBRR, TRAILBLI, UDSBENTD, UDSBENRS, REYMETHOD, CERAD1READ, CERAD2READ, CERAD3READ, MINTTOTS, MINTTOTW, MINTSCNG, MINTSCNC, MINTPCNG, MINTPCNC) is not blank
comp_vars: RMMODEC2C2T, MOCALOC, MOCAVIS, MOCATOTS, MOCATRAI, MOCACUBE, MOCACLOC, MOCACLON, MOCACLOH, MOCANAMI, MOCAREGI, NPSYCLOC, UDSBENTC, TRAILA, TRAILARR, TRAILALI, TRAILB, TRAILBRR, TRAILBLI, UDSBENTD, UDSBENRS, REYMETHOD, CERAD1READ, CERAD2READ, CERAD3READ, MINTTOTS, MINTTOTW, MINTSCNG, MINTSCNC, MINTPCNG, MINTPCNC

test_name: UDSVERTN is the total of subquestions
short_desc: If UDSVERFC not 95-98 and UDSVERLC not 95-98, UDSVERTN must be the total of UDSVERFC and UDSVERLC
full_desc: If Q12a. UDSVERFC not 95-98 and Q12d. UDSVERLC not 95-98, Q12g. UDSVERTN must be the total of UDSVERFC and UDSVERLC
test_logic: UDSVERFC <= 40 and UDSVERLC <=40 and UDSVERTN not = UDSVERFC + UDSVERLC

test_name: UDSVERTE is the total of subquestions
short_desc: UDSVERTE is the total of UDSVERFN and UDSVERLR
full_desc: Q12h. UDSVERTE must be the total of Q12b. UDSVERFN and Q12e. UDSVERLR
test_logic: UDSVERFN <=15 and UDSVERLR <=15 and UDSVERTE not = UDSVERFN + UDSVERLR

test_name: UDSVERTI is the total of subquestions
short_desc: UDSVERTI is the total of UDSVERNF and UDSVERLN
full_desc: Q12i. UDSVERTI must be the total of Q12c. UDSVERNF and Q12f. UDSVERLN
test_logic: UDSVERNF <=15 and UDSVERLN <=15 and UDSVERTI not = UDSVERNF + UDSVERLN

test_name: MOCBTOTS is the total of subquestions
short_desc: MOCBTOTS is the total of (MOCADIGI, MOCALETT, MOCASER7, MOCAREPE, MOCAFLUE, MOCAABST, MOCARECN, MOCAORDT, MOCAORMO, MOCAORYR, MOCAORDY, MOCAORPL, MOCAORCT)
full_desc: If all subquestions are completed, MOCBTOTS is the total of (MOCADIGI, MOCALETT, MOCASER7, MOCAREPE, MOCAFLUE, MOCAABST, MOCARECN, MOCAORDT, MOCAORMO, MOCAORYR, MOCAORDY, MOCAORPL, MOCAORCT)
test_logic: MOCADIGI <= 2 and MOCALETT <=1 and MOCASER7 <=3 and MOCAREPE <=2 and MOCAFLUE <=1 and MOCAABST <=2 and MOCARECN <=5 and MOCAORDT <=1 and MOCAORMO <=1 and MOCAORYR <=1 and MOCAORDY <=1 and MOCAORPL <=1 and MOCAORCT <=1 and MOCBTOTS ne total of total of (MOCADIGI, MOCALETT, MOCASER7, MOCAREPE, MOCAFLUE, MOCAABST, MOCARECN, MOCAORDT, MOCAORMO, MOCAORYR, MOCAORDY, MOCAORPL, MOCAORCT)
comp_vars: MOCBTOTS, MOCADIGI, MOCALETT, MOCASER7, MOCAREPE, MOCAFLUE, MOCAABST, MOCARECN, MOCAORDT, MOCAORMO, MOCAORYR, MOCAORDY, MOCAORPL, MOCAORCT
